briefTitle: Sentinel Node Biopsy and Axillary Sampling in Operable Breast Cancer
officialTitle: Clinical Trial of Sentinel Node Biopsy Versus Axillary Sampling in Women With Clinically Node Negative Operable Breast Cancer
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Comparison of methodologies in predicting status of axillary lymph nodes
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Clinically node negative operable breast cancer
* No prior incision or excision biopsy

Exclusion Criteria:

* Palpable axillary lymph nodes
* Contraindications for injecting radiocolloid
